ComicInfo.Series: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE BEST-SELLING SERIES REACHES ITS TITANIC CONCLUSION!
Two worlds face annihilation in an all-out war between the DCU and Legendary's MonsterVerse!
With the help of Godzilla and Kong, can the Justice League win a battle against a reformed Mechagodzilla and a new, even more deadly, hybrid Titan--a by-product of two worlds, the likes of which neither universe has ever seen!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-26 17:34:06. [CVDB1056127]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dan Mora, Drew Johnson, Jim Lee, Kendrick Lim, Mikel Janin

ComicInfo.Teams: Batman Family, Green Lantern Corps, Justice League of America, Legion of Doom, Team Arrow, The Titans
ComicInfo.Locations: Centennial Park, Justice League Watchtower, Metropolis
